fullText: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical about the Comedian Harmonists, a popular German singing group that was torn apart by the rise of the Nazis, finally makes it to Broadway after decades of development.
dtliExcerpt: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical about the Comedian Harmonists, a popular German singing group that was torn apart by the rise of the Nazis, finally makes it to Broadway after decades of development.
